Content: Commandant, I'm here.
Summer? I love the warm feeling... But I'll always have this warm feeling as long as I'm with everyone in Gray Raven. What about you, Commandant? Do you feel the same?

Feeling hot? Well... I think there are chilled watermelon and cold drinks over there. Liv should also have some things to cool you down. No, I can't do that. You would be frostbitten if I cool you off.
Whew... Maybe I can have some ice cream to cool down...
There seems to be a grill over there. It's nice to have a barbecue in an outdoor vacation like this, right? But Liv told me to be careful with it... I wonder what she meant...
Commandant, not sure if you notice it. The footprints we left when we set foot on this island were washed away by the sea... But the sea will remember them, and so will I.
Have you got a plan for our holiday, Commandant?
I'll be here for the time being, Commandant.
Is there anything I can help with, Commandant?
I had scanned the entire island before we landed. It's completely safe. The only hidden danger on this island is... that grill over there.
You also noticed the stage, Commandant? There are instruments on it. It's said that they were left for the visitors. Would you like to give them a try?
This island is warm enough even though it's isolated.

Me? If I can, I would like to bring a coconut back and see if I can plant it. Not sure what kind of coconut tree it would grow into in the space... No, of course I won't plant it directly in our lounge.
I feel... secure. The wind, the sunshine, and the warm sand will always make me feel relaxed... Do you feel the same, Commandant?
I'll remember this holiday we spend together, Commandant.
Goodbye, Commandant. I'll always be here.
Hi, Commandant.
In my memory, summer is always full of suffocating dust or a rain that won't stop for dozens of days. It's never this clear and bright. And most importantly, it's comfortable here.
Have you watched the Summer Brawl before? It is an anime from the Golden Age. I think it's a perfect fit for this happy and relaxing time.
I'm already very happy to be able to pass a peaceful summer.

Look! Is that a seagull? I only saw its illustration before, but I can still recognize it just like that. It must be wonderful to fly freely between the sky and the sea... This is, of course, one of my wishes as well.
I actually had a horrible first impression on the sea, but now I finally get the chance to look at it quietly... What's on the other side of the sea?
Go and have a look. What you see is what I want to see.
Goodbye, Commandant.
Hmm... What's up, Commandant?
Spring, summer, fall, and winter are all good seasons to take a sleep... Hmm? You feel the same?
Do you like this season? It is a sleepy season... Hmm? No, I don't want to go anywhere else. It's comfortable here. You go for me...
At least we have some great sunshine here, right?
I checked the coastline, but today is the first time that I get to relax like this... What? We are on holiday? Then let me take a nap first...
Speaking of which, the beach chair is perfect to nap on, especially in the sea wind... Do you want to give it a go?
Hmm, Kamui has been asking me to play with him in the sea... What? You haven't seen him? Thank God...
Good night... No, see you.
Hello, Commandant.
In my memory, the sea means more dangerous missions, but faith and purpose are like the rocks. They are unshakable...
How do you feel about the sea? It won't stay calm like this forever. It can be turbulent and terrifying... But will you still feel the same way you do when it's like that?
I miss the sea so bad.
About the frames... Do you mind it? They are part of me, but I prefer to spend my holiday in a more relaxing way.
For the Purifying Force, the brief moment of standby is our holiday... What about the Task Force? You don't have much time off, do you? Commandant?
I'll be here watching, Commandant. Both the sea and you.
See ya, Commandant.
Hey! Commandant! Nice to see you again!
Commandant! There! Did you see the snack stand over there? Yeah, that thing called hamburger... Oh, it's fast food, right? It smells so good... I wonder how it tastes.
Kowloong has so many delicious foods in summer! The sweet soup, the bean jelly, the fruits, and the ice bowl. I've heard of the ice bowl, but I never had the chance to try it...
I've got to take you to try Kowloong's summer snacks if we have the time!
I remember seeing the sea on the Nighter every day. Or the sea was all that I could see... Sounds confusing, doesn't it? Anyways, I love the sea here!
By the way, the stars in the night at sea are different from what we see in Babylonia. You haven't seen it before, right? Commandant? Let's look at the stars together at night!
Commandant, promise you'll take me when you go to the sea.
Bye, Commandant.
Ha! There you are.

My experience tells me that there are a few Corrupted hidden in that beach over there. And I wouldn't be surprised if some Ascendants suddenly come down from the sky... Yeah, that look. You don't need to suppress your nervousness. It's okay. I understand.
Commandant, get me a cold drink over there. You can get yourself one too. But don't get the wrong one. For the record, I have no experience in rescuing people who drink the cooling liquid by mistake.
The island is perfect for holiday. Plus, it's not boring here.
When was the last time when the sea, the summer, and you were together? You should remember, right? Well... You'd better remember.
Sometimes I wonder if we should change our clothes, or coatings, according to the season. After all, summer is not a calm season, right?
You'll have to make some sacrifice if you want to share this shade with me... Think about it.
Hmm? Are you leaving already?
Hello, Conductor.
Only the smell of the sea can bring our souls back. I think you can feel it too, right? Conductor? The wind comes from the sea...
Maybe we will only remember the summer we spent together when the horrible storm has passed and the sun casts its light on the ground.
The storm has passed, so we can enjoy the sunshine on the island.
Yes, of course, we've all been on the stage and off the stage. I just miss this feeling. But these instruments... feel so strange.
Would you like to hear something? Maybe I can play something for you. But most of the ball music can't be performed by one person... Would you like to join me, Conductor?
A stage that I can't hide from. A stage that makes me stay.
Until then, Conductor.
Hello, Commandant. Is there anything I can help with?
Speaking of which, we haven't made time to have some rest for a long time. "Rest and rejuvenate is also a tactic." I remember that's what the instructors told us in F.O.S.
If the holiday lasts forever, then I'm afraid it will become just like work, right? This is exactly why this holiday is so precious.
I'll be around anytime if you want some rest.
The unexpected holiday caught me off guard. I don't have any plans yet... What about you, Commandant? Any suggestions?
...Oh, sorry, I was lost in thought. I didn't notice that you were calling me. Sometimes I would empty my mind like this when I have the time. It's a good way to relax. You should try, Commandant.
Planning holidays for you and yourself is part of your duty as a commandant and captain.
Goodbye, Commandant.
What? Are you starting to enjoy the holiday?
This is a nice place to take a holiday... Would you like to lie down a bit here? Just relax. You're having a holiday.
...I'm good, sitting here and enjoying the sea wind. If you want some food, there seem to be some snacks over there, but I'm not sure how it tastes.
I'm curious about where the stage gets its power. I bet it's not some mysterious summer power...
Me? For me, it's not whether I like it or not. It's just that I feel calm staring at the sea. And it's a good time killer as well.
You are so strange. It's your holiday, but you're worrying about other people... I know. I'm fine. I can be better if you want.
You can take this holiday as our holiday, because that is what I think.
Nothing else? Fine.
